docna.cdata!:
Mali - Integrated Rural Development Project
            : Credit 0491 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mali - Integrated Rural
            Development Project : Credit 0491 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Integrated Rural Development Project
            for Mali provides for intensifying and extending into new
            areas the present 'Operation Arachide'; supplying
            farm inputs and/or equipment to participating farmers and
            selected blacksmiths; improving 1,500 km of tracks in the
            project area; expanding the ongoing functional literacy
            program; implementing a program of agricultural research;
            improving medical facilities and veterinary services in the
            project area; and establishing a project evaluation unit.

            and extending into new areas the present "Operation
            Arachide"; supplying farm inputs and/or equipment to
            participating farmers and selected blacksmiths; improving
            1,500 km of tracks in the project area; expanding the
            ongoing functional literacy program; implementing a program
            of agricultural research; improving medical facilities and
            veterinary services in the project area; and establishing a
            project evaluation unit.
